trans-unit.source: Native modules (also called addons in Node.js) are modules written in C or C++ that can be loaded into Node.js or Electron using the require() function, and used as if they were an ordinary Node.js module. They are used primarily to provide an interface between JavaScript running in Node.js and C/C++ libraries.
trans-unit.target: 本机模块（在Node.js中也称为插件）是用C或C ++编写的模块，可以使用require（）函数加载到Node.js或Electron中，就好像它们是普通的Node.js模块一样。它们主要用于在Node.js中运行的JavaScript和C / C ++库之间提供接口。

trans-unit.source: Navigation is a common attack vector. If an attacker can convince your app to navigate away from its current page, they can possibly force your app to open web sites on the Internet. Even if your webContents are configured to be more secure (like having nodeIntegration disabled or contextIsolation enabled), getting your app to open a random web site will make the work of exploiting your app a lot easier.
trans-unit.target: 导航是一种常见的攻击手段。如果攻击者可以说服您的应用程序离开当前页面，则可能会迫使您的应用程序打开Internet上的网站。即使将 webContents 配置为更安全（例如，禁用 nodeIntegration 或启用 contextIsolation ），让您的应用程序打开随机网站也会使开发应用程序的工作变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: Note that blindly calling this method probably makes Electron slower since it will have to refill these emptied caches, you should only call it if an event in your app has occurred that makes you think your page is actually using less memory (i.e. you have navigated from a super heavy page to a mostly empty one, and intend to stay there).

trans-unit.source: Note that the safest option is to fully disable the remote module. If you choose to filter access rather than completely disable the module, you must be very careful to ensure that no escalation of privilege is possible through the modules you allow past the filter.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not quit the app when executed, you have to call app.quit or app.exit after calling app.relaunch to make the app restart.

trans-unit.source: Note that when the execution of script fails, the returned promise will not reject and the result would be undefined. This is because Chromium does not dispatch errors of isolated worlds to foreign worlds.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当脚本执行失败时，返回的Promise将不会拒绝， result 将是 undefined 。这是因为Chromium不会将孤立世界的错误分发到国外世界。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，第三个参数 true 指示侦听器将始终在其他侦听器之前收到按键，因此它们无法调用 stopPropagation() 。

trans-unit.source: Offscreen rendering lets you obtain the content of a browser window in a bitmap, so it can be rendered anywhere, for example on a texture in a 3D scene. The offscreen rendering in Electron uses a similar approach than the Chromium Embedded Framework project.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕外渲染使您可以在位图中获取浏览器窗口的内容，因此可以将其渲染到任何位置，例如在3D场景中的纹理上。 Electron中的屏幕外渲染使用与Chromium Embedded Framework项目类似的方法。

trans-unit.target: 在Linux上，用户必须在命令行中添加 --enable-transparent-visuals --disable-gpu 以禁用GPU并允许ARGB生成透明窗口，这是由上游错误导致的，该错误在某些通道上不起作用 Linux上的NVidia驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: On Mac, the native window shadow will not be shown on a transparent window.
trans-unit.target: 在Mac上,本机窗口阴影将不会显示在透明窗口上。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 10, a shortcut to your app with an Application User Model ID must be installed to the Start Menu.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 10上，必须将具有应用程序用户型号ID的应用程序快捷方式安装到“开始”菜单。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 10, a shortcut to your app with an Application User Model ID must be installed to the Start Menu. This can be overkill during development, so adding node_modules\electron\dist\electron.exe to your Start Menu also does the trick. Navigate to the file in Explorer, right-click and 'Pin to Start Menu'. You will then need to add the line app.setAppUserModelId(process.execPath) to your main process to see notifications.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 10上，必须将具有应用程序用户型号ID的应用程序快捷方式安装到“开始”菜单。在开发过程中这可能会 node_modules\electron\dist\electron.exe ，因此将“ node_modules \ electron \ dist \ electron.exe”添加到“开始”菜单也可以解决问题。导航到资源管理器中的文件，右键单击并选择“固定到开始菜单”。然后，您需要将行 app.setAppUserModelId(process.execPath) 添加到主进程中以查看通知。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 7, notifications work via a custom implementation which visually resembles the native one on newer systems.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 7上,通知通过一个自定义的实现工作,它在视觉上与新系统上的原生通知相似。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 8.1 and Windows 8, a shortcut to your app with an Application User Model ID must be installed to the Start screen. Note, however, that it does not need to be pinned to the Start screen.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 8.1和Windows 8上，必须将具有应用程序用户型号ID的应用程序快捷方式安装到“开始”屏幕。但是请注意，它不需要固定到“开始”屏幕。

trans-unit.source: On Windows a taskbar button can be used to display a progress bar. This enables a window to provide progress information to the user without the user having to switch to the window itself.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,任务栏按钮可用于显示进度条。这使窗口能够向用户提供进度信息,而无需用户切换到窗口本身。

trans-unit.source: On Windows a taskbar button can use a small overlay to display application status, as quoted from MSDN:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,一个任务栏按钮可以使用一个小的叠加来显示应用程序状态,引用自MSDN。

trans-unit.source: On Windows and Linux always returns true.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows和Linux上，始终返回 true 。

trans-unit.target: 在Windows和Linux上。

trans-unit.source: On Windows and macOS, Electron uses crashpad to monitor and report crashes. On Linux, Electron uses breakpad. This is an implementation detail driven by Chromium, and it may change in future. In particular, crashpad is newer and will likely eventually replace breakpad on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows和macOS上，Electron使用崩溃板监视和报告崩溃。在Linux上，Electron使用breakpad。这是Chromium驱动的实现细节，将来可能会更改。特别是，crashpad较新，并且最终可能会在所有平台上取代breakpad。

trans-unit.source: On Windows it is not supported to change parent window dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,不支持动态改变父窗口。

trans-unit.source: On Windows it is recommended to use ICO icons to get best visual effects.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，建议使用 ICO 图标以获得最佳视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: On Windows only releaseName is available.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，只有 releaseName 可用。

trans-unit.source: On Windows operating systems, transparent windows will not work when DWM is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows操作系统上,当DWM被禁用时,透明窗口将无法工作。

trans-unit.source: On Windows the options are more limited, due to the Win32 APIs used:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,由于使用的是Win32 API,选项比较有限。

trans-unit.source: On Windows the path passed to --ppapi-flash-path has to use \ as path delimiter, using POSIX-style paths will not work.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，传递给 --ppapi-flash-path 的路径必须使用 \ 作为路径定界符，使用POSIX样式的路径将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: On Windows the required binaries are widevinecdm.dll and widevinecdmadapter.dll, on macOS they are libwidevinecdm.dylib and widevinecdmadapter.plugin. You can copy them to anywhere you like, but they have to be put together.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，所需的二进制文件是 widevinecdm.dll 和 widevinecdmadapter.dll ，在macOS上，它们是 libwidevinecdm.dylib 和 widevinecdmadapter.plugin 。您可以将它们复制到任意位置，但必须将它们放在一起。

trans-unit.source: On Windows the system assigns a trust level to your code signing certificate which if you don't have, or if your trust level is low will cause security dialogs to appear when users start using your application. Trust level builds over time so it's better to start code signing as early as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,系统会给你的代码签名证书分配一个信任级别,如果你没有这个证书,或者你的信任级别很低,当用户开始使用你的应用程序时,就会出现安全对话框。信任级别会随着时间的推移而建立,所以最好尽早开始代码签名。

trans-unit.source: On Windows you can add a thumbnail toolbar with specified buttons in a taskbar layout of an application window. It provides users a way to access to a particular window's command without restoring or activating the window.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,你可以在应用程序窗口的任务栏布局中添加一个带有指定按钮的缩略图工具栏。它为用户提供了一种无需恢复或激活窗口就能访问特定窗口的命令的方法。

trans-unit.source: On Windows you can highlight the taskbar button to get the user's attention. This is similar to bouncing the dock icon on macOS. From the MSDN reference documentation:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,你可以突出任务栏按钮来吸引用户的注意力。这类似于macOS上弹出dock图标。来自MSDN参考文档。

trans-unit.source: On Windows you can provide optional parameters path, the path to your executable, and args, an array of arguments to be passed to your executable when it launches.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows中,你可以提供可选的参数path,即你的可执行文件的路径,以及args,即当你的可执行文件启动时要传递给它的参数数组。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, SMBv2 has a directory cache that will cause problems with the git cache script, so it is necessary to disable it by setting the registry key
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,SMBv2有一个目录缓存,会导致git缓存脚本出现问题,所以需要通过设置注册表中的键来禁止它。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, a mode can be passed. Accepted values are none, normal, indeterminate, error, and paused. If you call setProgressBar without a mode set (but with a value within the valid range), normal will be assumed.

trans-unit.source: On Windows, a taskbar button can use a small overlay to display application status.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,任务栏按钮可以使用一个小覆盖来显示应用程序状态。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, by default, node-gyp links native modules against node.dll. However, in Electron 4.x and higher, the symbols needed by native modules are exported by electron.exe, and there is no node.dll. In order to load native modules on Windows, node-gyp installs a delay-load hook that triggers when the native module is loaded, and redirects the node.dll reference to use the loading executable instead of looking for node.dll in the library search path (which would turn up nothing). As such, on Electron 4.x and higher, 'win_delay_load_hook': 'true' is required to load native modules.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，默认情况下， node-gyp node.dll 将本机模块链接到node.dll。但是，在Electron 4.x和更高版本中，本机模块所需的符号由 electron.exe 导出，并且没有 node.dll 。为了在Windows上加载本机模块， node-gyp 安装了一个延迟加载钩子，该钩子在加载本机模块时触发，并重定向 node.dll 参考以使用加载的可执行文件，而不是在库搜索中查找 node.dll 。路径（不会显示任何内容）。因此，在Electron 4.x及更高版本上，需要 'win_delay_load_hook': 'true' 来加载本机模块。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, possible type is toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上，可能的类型是 toolbar 。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, the system assigns a trust level to your code signing certificate which if you don't have, or if your trust level is low, will cause security dialogs to appear when users start using your application. Trust level builds over time so it's better to start code signing as early as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,系统会给你的代码签名证书分配一个信任级别,如果你没有这个证书,或者你的信任级别很低,当用户开始使用你的应用程序时,就会出现安全对话框。信任级别会随着时间的推移而建立,所以最好尽早开始代码签名。

trans-unit.source: Once executed, the tool goes to work: It accepts your Electron app as an input, flattening the node_modules. Then, it archives your application as app.zip. Using an installer and a Windows Container, the tool creates an "expanded" AppX package - including the Windows Application Manifest (AppXManifest.xml) as well as the virtual file system and the virtual registry inside your output folder.
trans-unit.target: 一旦执行，该工具便开始工作：它接受您的Electron应用作为输入，展平 node_modules 。然后，它将您的应用程序存档为 app.zip 。该工具使用安装程序和Windows容器创建一个“扩展的” AppX程序包-包括Windows应用程序清单（ AppXManifest.xml ）以及输出文件夹中的虚拟文件系统和虚拟注册表。

Find the macOS Terminal application in your /Applications/Utilities folder (or by searching for the word Terminal in Spotlight). Open up Terminal or another command line client of your choice and confirm that both node and npm are available:

trans-unit.source: Once the expanded AppX files are created, the tool uses the Windows App Packager (MakeAppx.exe) to create a single-file AppX package from those files on disk. Finally, the tool can be used to create a trusted certificate on your computer to sign the new AppX package. With the signed AppX package, the CLI can also automatically install the package on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 创建扩展的AppX文件后，该工具将使用Windows App Packager（ MakeAppx.exe ）从磁盘上的那些文件创建单文件AppX程序包。最后，该工具可用于在您的计算机上创建受信任的证书，以对新的AppX软件包进行签名。使用签名的AppX软件包，CLI还可以自动将软件包安装在您的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Once the merge has finished successfully, run the release script via npm run release to finish the release process. This script will do the following: 1. Build the project to validate that the correct version number is being released. 2. Download the binaries and generate the node headers and the .lib linker used on Windows by node-gyp to build native modules. 3. Create and upload the SHASUMS files stored on S3 for the node files. 4. Create and upload the SHASUMS256.txt file stored on the GitHub release. 5. Validate that all of the required files are present on GitHub and S3 and have the correct checksums as specified in the SHASUMS files. 6. Publish the release on GitHub 7. Delete the release branch.
trans-unit.target: 合并成功完成后，通过 npm run release 运行 release 脚本以完成发布过程。该脚本将执行以下操作：1.构建项目以验证是否发布了正确的版本号。 2.下载二进制文件，并生成节点标头和node-gyp在Windows上使用的.lib链接器，以构建本机模块。 3.为节点文件创建并上传存储在S3上的SHASUMS文件。 4.创建并上传存储在GitHub版本中的SHASUMS256.txt文件。 5.验证所有必需文件都存在于GitHub和S3上，并具有SHASUMS文件中指定的正确校验和。 6.在GitHub上发布发行版。7.删除 release 分支。

trans-unit.source: Once the release builds have finished, merge the release branch back into the source release branch using the merge-release script. If the branch cannot be successfully merged back this script will automatically rebase the release branch and push the changes which will trigger the release builds again, which means you will need to wait for the release builds to run again before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 一旦发布版本已经完成，合并 release 分支回用源发布分支 merge-release 脚本。如果分支无法成功合并，此脚本将自动为 release 分支重新设置基础并推送更改，这将再次触发发行版本，这意味着您需要等待发行版本再次运行才能继续。

trans-unit.source: One of Electron's great benefits is that you know exactly which engine will parse your JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. If you're re-purposing code that was written for the web at large, make sure to not polyfill features included in Electron.
trans-unit.target: Electron的一大好处是,你可以准确地知道哪个引擎会解析你的JavaScript、HTML和CSS。如果你重新利用为整个网络编写的代码,请确保不要使用Electron中包含的polyfill功能。

trans-unit.source: One of the key security features of Chromium is that all blink rendering/JavaScript code is executed within a sandbox. This sandbox uses OS-specific features to ensure that exploits in the renderer process cannot harm the system.
trans-unit.target: Chromium的关键安全特性之一是所有的闪烁渲染/JavaScript代码都在沙箱内执行。这个沙盒使用了操作系统特有的特性,以确保渲染器过程中的漏洞无法伤害系统。

trans-unit.source: One page can have multiple classes.
trans-unit.target: 一个页面可以有多个类。

trans-unit.source: One planned enhancement that should greatly increase security is to block IPC messages from sandboxed renderers by default, allowing the main process to explicitly define a set of messages the renderer is allowed to send.
trans-unit.target: 一个计划中的增强功能应该会大大增加安全性,那就是默认阻止来自沙盒渲染器的IPC消息,允许主进程明确定义一组允许渲染器发送的消息。

trans-unit.source: One upgrade issue is building all of Electron with a single copy of V8 to ensure compatibility. This is important because upstream Node and libchromiumcontent both use their own versions of V8.
trans-unit.target: 一个升级问题是使用单个V8副本构建所有Electron，以确保兼容性。这很重要，因为上游Node和libchromiumcontent都使用自己的V8版本。

trans-unit.source: Parameters added in this fashion (or via the extra parameter to crashReporter.start) are specific to the calling process. Adding extra parameters in the main process will not cause those parameters to be sent along with crashes from renderer or other child processes. Similarly, adding extra parameters in a renderer process will not result in those parameters being sent with crashes that occur in other renderer processes or in the main process.

trans-unit.source: Registering a scheme as standard allows relative and absolute resources to be resolved correctly when served. Otherwise the scheme will behave like the file protocol, but without the ability to resolve relative URLs.
trans-unit.target: 将方案注册为标准允许在提供服务时正确解析相对资源和绝对资源。否则，该方案的行为将类似于 file 协议，但是无法解析相对URL。

trans-unit.source: Registering a scheme as standard will allow access to files through the FileSystem API. Otherwise the renderer will throw a security error for the scheme.
trans-unit.target: 将方案注册为标准配置将允许通过FileSystem API访问文件。否则，渲染器将为方案抛出安全错误。

trans-unit.source: Registering a scheme as standard, will allow relative and absolute resources to be resolved correctly when served. Otherwise the scheme will behave like the file protocol, but without the ability to resolve relative URLs.
trans-unit.target: 将方案注册为标准方案，可以在服务时正确解析相对资源和绝对资源。否则，该方案的行为将类似于 file 协议，但是无法解析相对URL。

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send a file as the response. The handler will be called with request and callback where request is an incoming request for the scheme.

trans-unit.source: Registers a protocol of scheme that will send the file as a response. The handler will be called with handler(request, callback) when a request is going to be created with scheme. completion will be called with completion(null) when scheme is successfully registered or completion(error) when failed.
trans-unit.target: 注册 scheme 协议，该协议将发送文件作为响应。该 handler 将被用 handler(request, callback) 当一个 request 是要与创建 scheme 。 completion 将被用 completion(null) 时， scheme 被成功注册或 completion(error) 失败时。

trans-unit.source: Registers the scheme as secure scheme.

trans-unit.source: Registers the scheme as secure, bypasses content security policy for resources, allows registering ServiceWorker and supports fetch API.

trans-unit.source: Registers the scheme as standard, secure, bypasses content security policy for resources, allows registering ServiceWorker, supports fetch API, and streaming video/audio. Specify a privilege with the value of true to enable the capability.

trans-unit.source: Renderer process APIs webFrame.registerURLSchemeAsPrivileged and webFrame.registerURLSchemeAsBypassingCSP as well as browser process API protocol.registerStandardSchemes have been removed. A new API, protocol.registerSchemesAsPrivileged has been added and should be used for registering custom schemes with the required privileges. Custom schemes are required to be registered before app ready.
trans-unit.target: webFrame.registerURLSchemeAsPrivileged 器流程API webFrame.registerURLSchemeAsPrivileged和 webFrame.registerURLSchemeAsBypassingCSP 以及浏览器流程API protocol.registerStandardSchemes 。registerStandardSchemes已被删除。已添加新的API， protocol.registerSchemesAsPrivileged ，应将其用于注册具有所需特权的自定义方案。必须先注册自定义方案，然后才能准备好应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Rendering untrusted content
trans-unit.target: 渲染不受信任的内容

trans-unit.source: Rendering untrusted content in Electron is still somewhat uncharted territory, though some apps are finding success (e.g. Beaker Browser). Our goal is to get as close to Chrome as we can in terms of the security of sandboxed content, but ultimately we will always be behind due to a few fundamental issues:
trans-unit.target: 在Electron中渲染不受信任的内容仍然是一个未知的领域,尽管一些应用程序发现了成功(例如Beaker浏览器)。我们的目标是在沙盒内容的安全性方面尽可能地接近Chrome,但由于一些基本问题,最终我们总是会落后。

trans-unit.source: Returns Promise<Boolean> - A promise that resolves with true if consent was granted and false if it was denied. If an invalid mediaType is passed, the promise will be rejected. If an access request was denied and later is changed through the System Preferences pane, a restart of the app will be required for the new permissions to take effect. If access has already been requested and denied, it must be changed through the preference pane; an alert will not pop up and the promise will resolve with the existing access status.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Promise<Boolean> -一个诺言，如果授予同意，则以 true 进行解析，如果被拒绝，则以 false 进行解析。如果传递了无效的 mediaType ，则承诺将被拒绝。如果访问请求被拒绝，后来又通过“系统偏好设置”窗格进行了更改，则需要重新启动应用程序才能使新权限生效。如果已经请求和拒绝访问，则必须通过首选项窗格进行更改；不会弹出警报，诺言将以现有的访问状态解决。

trans-unit.source: Returns Promise<void> - the promise will resolve when the page has finished loading (see did-finish-load), and rejects if the page fails to load (see did-fail-load). A noop rejection handler is already attached, which avoids unhandled rejection errors.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Promise<void> -当页面加载完成时，promise将解决（请参见 did-finish-load ），如果页面加载失败，则将拒绝（请参见 did-fail-load ）。已经附加了noop拒绝处理程序，这避免了未处理的拒绝错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns Promise<void> - the promise will resolve when the page has finished loading (see did-finish-load), and rejects if the page fails to load (see did-fail-load).
trans-unit.target: 返回 Promise<void> -承诺将在页面完成加载时解决（请参见 did-finish-load ），并拒绝页面加载失败的情况（请参见 did-fail-load ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns Promise<void> - the promise will resolve when the page has finished loading (see did-finish-load), and rejects if the page fails to load (see did-fail-load). A noop rejection handler is already attached, which avoids unhandled rejection errors.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Promise<void> -承诺将在页面完成加载时解决（请参见 did-finish-load ），并拒绝页面加载失败的情况（请参见 did-fail-load ）。已经附加了noop拒绝处理程序，这避免了未处理的拒绝错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns Promise - A promise that resolves with the result of the executed code or is rejected if the result of the code is a rejected promise.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Promise (承诺) -用执行的代码的结果解决的承诺，或者如果代码的结果是被拒绝的承诺，则被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Returns Record<Number, ServiceWorkerInfo> - A ServiceWorkerInfo object where the keys are the service worker version ID and the values are the information about that service worker.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Record<Number, ServiceWorkerInfo> -一个ServiceWorkerInfo对象，其中的键是服务工作者的版本ID，其值是有关该服务工作者的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns Record<Number, ServiceWorkerInfo> - A ServiceWorkerInfo object where the keys are the service worker version ID and the values are the information about that service worker.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Record<Number, ServiceWorkerInfo> -一个ServiceWorkerInfo对象，其中的键是服务工作者的版本ID，其值是有关该服务工作者的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns Record<String, ExtensionInfo> - The keys are the extension names and each value is an Object containing name and version properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Record<String, ExtensionInfo> -键是扩展名，每个值是一个包含 name 和 version 属性的Object 。

trans-unit.source: Returns Record<String, String> - The current 'extra' parameters of the crash reporter.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Record<String, String> -崩溃报告程序的当前“额外”参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns Record<string, ExtensionInfo> - The keys are the extension names and each value is an Object containing name and version properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Record<string, ExtensionInfo> -键是扩展名，每个值是一个包含 name 和 version 属性的Object 。

trans-unit.source: Returns SaveDialogOptions - Returns the object previously set by downloadItem.setSaveDialogOptions(options).
trans-unit.target: 返回 SaveDialogOptions -返回先前由 downloadItem.setSaveDialogOptions(options) 设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns Session - A session instance from partition string. When there is an existing Session with the same partition, it will be returned; otherwise a new Session instance will be created with options.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Session - partition 字符串中的会话实例。当存在具有相同 partition Session 时，它将被返回；否则，将使用 options 创建一个新的 Session 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns String | undefined, the path of the file chosen by the user; if the dialog is cancelled it returns undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String | undefined ，用户选择的文件的路径；如果取消对话框，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - A key for the inserted CSS that can later be used to remove the CSS via webFrame.removeInsertedCSS(key).
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -一种用于插入的CSS以后可以用于通过除去CSS密钥 webFrame.removeInsertedCSS(key) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - A path to a special directory or file associated with name. On failure an Error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -指向与 name 关联的特殊目录或文件的路径。失败时将引发 Error 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - A path to a special directory or file associated with name. On failure, an Error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -指向与 name 关联的特殊目录或文件的路径。失败时，将引发 Error 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Can be dark, light or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -可以是 dark ， light 或 unknown 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Can be not-determined, granted, denied, restricted or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -可以 not-determined ， granted ， denied ， restricted 或 unknown 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - ETag header value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -ETag标头值。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Gets the background color of the window. See Setting backgroundColor.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -获取窗口的背景色。请参阅设置 backgroundColor 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Last-Modified header value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -Last-Modified标头值。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Name of the application handling the protocol, or an empty string if there is no handler. For instance, if Electron is the default handler of the URL, this could be Electron on Windows and Mac. However, don't rely on the precise format which is not guaranteed to remain unchanged. Expect a different format on Linux, possibly with a .desktop suffix.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -处理协议的应用程序的名称，如果没有处理程序，则为空字符串。例如，如果Electron是URL的默认处理程序，则在Windows和Mac上可以是 Electron 。但是，不要依赖不能保证保持不变的精确格式。在Linux上期望使用其他格式，可能带有 .desktop 后缀。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Reads format type from the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -读取 format 从剪贴板类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - Returns the WebRTC IP Handling Policy.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -返回WebRTC IP处理策略。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The Content-Disposition field from the response header.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -从响应头内容处置场。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The URL of guest page.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -访客页面的URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The URL of the current web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前网页的URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The badge string of the dock.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -扩展坞的徽章字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The command-line switch value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -命令行开关值。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The content in the clipboard as RTF.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -剪贴板中的内容为RTF。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The content in the clipboard as markup.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -剪贴板中的内容作为标记。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The content in the clipboard as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -剪贴板中的内容为纯文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current application directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前应用程序目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current application locale. Possible return values are documented here.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前的应用程序区域设置。可能的返回值在此处记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current application locale. Possible return values are documented here.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前应用程序的语言环境。可能的返回值在此处记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current application's name, which is the name in the application's package.json file.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前应用程序的名称，即应用程序的 package.json 文件中的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current state. Can be progressing, completed, cancelled or interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前状态。可以 progressing ， completed ， cancelled 或 interrupted 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The current update feed URL.

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The data URL of the image.

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The file name of the download item.

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The files mime type.

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The origin URL where the item is downloaded from.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -从中下载项目的原始URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The origin url where the item is downloaded from.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -从中下载项目的原始URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The pathname of the file the window represents.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -窗口代表文件的路径名。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The save path of the download item. This will be either the path set via downloadItem.setSavePath(path) or the path selected from the shown save dialog.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -下载项目的保存路径。这将是通过 downloadItem.setSavePath(path) 设置的路径，或者是从显示的保存对话框中选择的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The standard system color formatted as #RRGGBBAA.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -标准的系统颜色格式化为 #RRGGBBAA 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The system color setting in RGB hexadecimal form (#ABCDEF). See the Windows docs and the macOS docs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -RGB十六进制格式（ #ABCDEF ）的系统颜色设置。有关更多详细信息，请参见Windows文档和macOS文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The system color setting in RGB hexadecimal form (#ABCDEF). See the Windows docs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -RGB十六进制格式（ #ABCDEF ）的系统颜色设置。有关更多详细信息，请参见Windows文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The system's current state. Can be active, idle, locked or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -系统的当前状态。可以处于 active ， idle ， locked 或 unknown 。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The text on the find pasteboard, which is the pasteboard that holds information about the current state of the active application’s find panel.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -对发现纸板的文字，这是保存有关活动的应用程序的查找面板的当前状态信息的纸板。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The text on the find pasteboard. This method uses synchronous IPC when called from the renderer process. The cached value is reread from the find pasteboard whenever the application is activated.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -对发现纸板的文本。从渲染器进程调用时，此方法使用同步IPC。每当激活应用程序时，都会从查找粘贴板上重新读取缓存的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The title of guest page.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -访客页面的标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The title of the current web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前网页的标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The title of the native window.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -本机窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns String - The type of the currently running activity.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String -当前正在运行的活动的类型。
